title: Hungarian camerawoman fired after being filmed tripping refugees is suing Facebook — and the man she tripped
text:
Hungarian camerawoman fired after being filmed tripping refugees is suing Facebook — and the man she tripped 
National Post Friday 23rd October, 2015 
The Hungarian camerawoman who lost her job after a video of her tripping and kicking refugees went viral said she will sue Facebook and the man she tripped. 
Petra Laszlo was filming footage of police swarming a group of refugees when a Syrian father, carrying his young son in his arms, attempted to run through a gap between her and another cameraman. Laszlo is clearly seen sticking her leg out into the path of the refugee, who toppled to the ground with his son in his arms. 
In other footage filmed soon after, a wave of refugees begins running in Laszlo’s direction and she’s s...
